enhanced_by.reason: Both methods append a string to the output, making them functionally similar and potentially interdependent in test scenarios.
The overloaded 'id' method with an integer parameter can provide additional test cases to verify the behavior of the 'id' method with different inputs.
The 'toString' method can be used to verify the final output generated by the 'id' method, ensuring that the appended identifier is correctly represented in the final string.
